text: @rec777777 @BBCNews @BBCNewsnight The only fair way to compare different countries is to look at excess deaths which removes any local "shenanigans" that might increase/lower the local Covid-19 death toll.  I would be very surprised if Germany came out of such a comparison looking much worse than they do now.
